Invocation Name: everything disc assessment
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hello, my name is Len Clark, Ph.D., "The DiSC Teacher" and lead consultant at du Lac Leadership.

du Lac Leadership is an international consultancy firm specializing in leadership development and transformational change. With offices in Portage, Indiana (Chicago area) and Dublin, Ireland, we are dedicated to improving the performance of people and organizations worldwide.

Using the Everything DiSC® Application Suite of assessments, we help improve workplace productivity, communication, and performance. More specifically, we help individuals:

- Identify strengths and understand weaknesses 
- Effectively work with different personality types
- Improve communication and teamwork skills
- Become self-aware and adjust patterns of behavior
- Increase productivity and revenue

Remember, to "Grow Yourself, You Must Know Yourself," so contact us today!
